the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

witnesses_jsx.witness_info: Witnesses - are users who are elected by the community vote and are engaged in supporting the nodes that ensure the operation of the blockchain and many other issues related to the development of the project.
witnesses_jsx.what_is_api: API-nodes have higher demands on server resources, it is through them come the queries to the blockchain for sending/receiving information, they are important for the development of a variety of clients and services...
witnesses_jsx.what_is_seed: SEED-nodes are the basis for data exchange for the functioning of the blockchain, accepting and distributing blocks they unload the network bandwidth, reducing the response for geographically close connections...
witnesses_jsx.you_can_vote_for_maximum_of_witnesses: You can vote for a maximum of 30 witnesses
witnesses_jsx.witness_0: You haven't supported any delegates yet
witnesses_jsx.witness_deactive: Withness suspended the signature of the blocks
witnesses_jsx.no_price_feed: Withness did not publish the price feed
witnesses_jsx.if_you_want_to_vote_outside_of_top_enter: If you would like to vote for a witness outside of the top 100, enter the account name below to cast a vote
witnesses_jsx.set_witness_proxy: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses_jsx.witness_set: You have set a voting proxy. If you would like to reenable manual voting, please clear your proxy.

votesandcomments_jsx.no_responses_yet_click_to_respond: No responses yet. Click to respond.

assets_jsx.allow_danger_note: Cannot enable which forbidden on asset created!
assets_jsx.creator: Issuer
assets_jsx.overridable_no_tip: Revokable tokens not support TIP balance
assets_jsx.fee_not_allowed: Fee not allowed when asset created
assets_jsx.symbols_whitelist: Tokens to which can trade (one token per line, if empty - all allowed)
assets_jsx.trade_asset: Go to trading on the internal exchange
assets_jsx.mute_asset_confirm_TICKER: Confirm muting of %(TICKER)s? You will be able to unmute this asset in Settings of your profile.

invites_jsx.create_invite_info: Cheques (invite codes) are a universal tool for transferring of GOLOS tokens to other people outside the blockchain. There are two ways to redeem the code: transfer its balance to your account or register a new account using it.
invites_jsx.referral_invite:
During the year 10%% of user rewards (registered with this invite)
will be credited to your balance.
invites_jsx.success: Created! Save it (private key or link)
invites_jsx.register_link: Link to register with this invite check (for 1 user):
invites_jsx.claim_wrong_secret_cannot_fetch: Cannot connect to server to check invite code

userkeys_jsx.posting_key_is_required_it_should_be_dif: The posting key is used for posting and voting. It should be different from the active and owner keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_active_key_is_used_to_make_transfers: The active key is used to make transfers and place orders in the internal market.
userkeys_jsx.the_owner_key_is_required_to_change_othe: The owner key is the master key for the account and is required to change the other keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_private_key_or_password_should_be_ke: The private key or password for the owner key should be kept offline as much as possible.
userkeys_jsx.the_memo_key_is_used_to_create_and_read_: The memo key is used to create and read memos.

suggestpassword_jsx.APP_NAME_cannot_recover_passwords_keep_t: %(APP_NAME)s cannot recover passwords. Keep this page in a secure location, such as a fireproof safe or safety deposit box.
suggestpassword_jsx.after_printing_write_down_your_user_name: After printing, write down your user name

converttosteem_jsx.this_will_take_days: This action will take place 3.5 days from now and can not be canceled. These tokens will immediately become unavailable
converttosteem_jsx.tokens_will_be_unavailable: This action will take place 3.5 days from now and can not be canceled. These tokens will immediately become unavailable
converttosteem_jsx.this_will_take_days_hint: This is a price feed conversion. The 3.5 day delay is necessary to prevent abuse from gaming the price feed average

tips_js.tip_balance_hint: Balance that you use to reward users and that you use to earn rewards for yourself. Tokens from it can also be sent to increase the Golos Power.
tips_js.claim_balance_hint: Balance of your share of the emission of Golos blockchain tokens, which you can use to top up your TIP balance or increase the Golos Power.
tips_js.claim_expiration_hint: The tokens request window will end
tips_js.tradeable_tokens_that_may_be_transferred: Tradable digital tokens that can be transferred anywhere at any time.
tips_js.LIQUID_TOKEN_can_be_converted_to_VESTING: For example, converted to Golos Power or sent to the TIP balance for rewards.
tips_js.influence_tokens_which_give_you_more_con: The more Golos Power you have, the higher the percentage goes to the CLAIM balance and the higher the impact on the project development by selecting delegates and supporting applications for funding from the workers foundation.
tips_js.the_more_you_hold_the_more_you_influence: The more you hold the more you influence post rewards and earn for accurate voting.
tips_js.vesting_emission_per_day_title:
Amount that, depending on the Golos Power, is transferred daily to the CLAIM balance
(your share of the blockchain token issue per day)
tips_js.the_estimated_value_is_based_on_an_avera: The estimated cost is calculated on an 7-day average cost of %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.VESTING_TOKEN_is_non_transferrable_and_r: %(VESTING_TOKEN2)s is non-transferrable and requires 2 months (8 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.

powerdown_jsx.delegating: You are delegating %(AMOUNT)s %(LIQUID_TICKER)s. That amount is locked up and not available to power down until the delegation is removed and a full reward period has passed.
powerdown_jsx.warning: Leaving less than %(AMOUNT)s %(VESTING_TOKEN)s in your account is not recommended and can leave your account in a unusable state.

delegate_vesting_shares_info_jsx.confirm_cancel_delegation: Are you sure you want to cancel %(VESTING_TOKEN2)s delegation (you will receive tokens back during 7 days)?

faq_jsq.page_description: This page contains popular user questions and official Golos Blockchain communication channels.
faq_jsq.footer_message: We will never ask for your private keys or money. If someone introduces themselves as members of the Golos Blockchain team and asks for such information, please contact us.

workers.workers_info: For any work useful for the Golos Blockchain, you can get a reward by submitting an application, describing in detail what was done (development, design, advertising, documentation), anything if this initiative is supported by the community.
workers.percentage_voted_GP: Current percentage of the voted GP

emoji_i18n.emojiUnsupportedMessage: Your browser does not support color emoji.
emoji_i18n.networkErrorMessage: Could not load emoji. Try refreshing.
emoji_i18n.searchDescription: When search results are available, press up or down to select and enter to choose.
emoji_i18n.skinToneDescription: When expanded, press up or down to select and enter to choose.
